event.title: Enhance Your Career With ServiceNow Admin Certification
event.description:
The ServiceNow Administrator is responsible for enterprise-wide administration, support, and development of the ServiceNow platform
Main objective during ServiceNow Admin Training is learning system administration functions. Recipients will learn primary configuration tasks, clues to work with UI policies, Data policies, Business rules, the Mobile Platform and activate Plugins.

Schedule and Attend Free Demo here! KBS ServiceNow Admin Training

Course Features:

30 Days of Instructor-Led ServiceNow Training
Real World use cases and Scenarios
Practical Approach
Expert & Certified Trainers

About KBS:

KBS is one of the leading Online training providers with a decade of experience in the Online IT training Industry. We trained thousands of students and even handled hundreds of corporates clients across the world.
KBS offers the best training in the industry with industry expert trainers. Some of our on-demand courses such as ServiceNow, Business Intelligence, RPA, Blockchain, and Cyber Security.

Key Features:
Flexible Timings
Certified & Industry Experts Trainers
Multiple Training Delivery Models
Customize Course
24/7 Support
Hands-On Experience
Real-Time Use Cases
Q&A with Trainers
Job Support
Placement Assistance.
